1.10.2.1.0.7: Fixes TCon tools not being able to mine the blocks
1.10.2.1.2.0: Adds support for EnderIO, Railcraft and Immersive Engineering
1.10.2.1.2.1: New steel textures, fixes alloy blocks being unbreakable and adds a JEI plugin
1.10.2.1.3.1: Fixes a crash when generating new chunks
1.10.2.1.3.2: Actually fixes the world gen crash
1.10.2.1.3.3: Add coal to the IC2 Module and fix EnderIO ModID
1.10.2.1.3.4: New coal and silver textures since i missed them
1.10.2.1.4.0: Adds DenseOres compatibility and allows force enabling/disabling of any given material
1.10.2.1.4.5: Fixes a crash with the Mortar and Pestle in 1.11
1.10.2.1.4.6: Update localization and modify mining level of Silver and Lead
